attributes.action: Substantially increase the sentencing guidelines fordrivers causing death whilst driving an uninsured vehicle,driving without a license, leaving the scene of the accident and attempting to pervert the course of justice.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition has been set up to gain support for a change in the justice system, to ensure that the courts are able to set sentences appropriate to crimes involving driving whilst uninsured, whilst unlicensed, not stopping at the scene of the accident and then attempting to pervert the course of justice.
The Family wanted justice for Robert and were let down by the current limitations of the justice system. We do not want this to continue to happen to other families who lose their loved ones in this manner. Please help us to try and change this.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to substantially increase the sentencing guidelines fordrivers causing death whilst driving an uninsured vehicle,driving without a license, leaving the scene of the accident and attempting to pervert the course of justice.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=JusticeForRobert
